mutants.code:
def count_non_zero_carries(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    ans = 1
    carry = 0
    while a > 0 or b > 0:
        carry = (a % 10 + b % 10 + carry) // 10
        ans += 1 if carry > 0 else 0
        a //= 10
        b //= 10
    return ans

def count_non_zero_carries(a: int, b: int) -> int:

    return ans
